verses.kjv: These are the statutes and judgments, which ye shall observe to do in the land, which the LORD God of thy fathers giveth thee to possess it, all the days that ye live upon the earth.
verses.web: These are the statutes and the ordinances which you shall observe to do in the land which LORD, the God of your fathers, has given you to possess all the days that you live on the earth.
verses.ct: These are the laws and regulations you must carefully follow in the land that the LORD, the God of your ancestors, is giving you to possess — for as long as you live on the earth.

verses.kjv: Ye shall utterly destroy all the places, wherein the nations which ye shall possess served their gods, upon the high mountains, and upon the hills, and under every green tree:
verses.web: You shall surely destroy all the places in which the nations that you shall dispossess served their gods: on the high mountains, and on the hills, and under every green tree.
verses.ct: You must completely destroy every place where the nations you're driving out worshiped their gods — whether on the high mountains, on the hills, or under every green tree.

verses.kjv: And ye shall overthrow their altars, and break their pillars, and burn their groves with fire; and ye shall hew down the graven images of their gods, and destroy the names of them out of that place.
verses.web: You shall break down their altars, dash their pillars in pieces, and burn their Asherah poles with fire. You shall cut down the engraved images of their gods. You shall destroy their name out of that place.
verses.ct: Tear down their altars, smash their sacred pillars, burn their Asherah poles, and chop down the carved images of their gods. Wipe out every trace of their names from those places.

verses.kjv: Ye shall not do so unto the LORD your God.
verses.web: You shall not do so to LORD your God.
verses.ct: Don't worship the LORD your God the way those nations worshiped their gods.

verses.kjv: But unto the place which the LORD your God shall choose out of all your tribes to put his name there, even unto his habitation shall ye seek, and thither thou shalt come:
verses.web: But to the place which LORD your God shall choose out of all your tribes, to put his name there, you shall seek his habitation, and you shall come there.
verses.ct: Instead, seek out the place the LORD your God will choose from among all your tribes to establish his name and make his dwelling. That is where you must go.

verses.kjv: And thither ye shall bring your burnt offerings, and your sacrifices, and your tithes, and heave offerings of your hand, and your vows, and your freewill offerings, and the firstlings of your herds and of your flocks:
verses.web: You shall bring your burnt offerings, your sacrifices, your tithes, the wave offering of your hand, your vows, your free will offerings, and the firstborn of your herd and of your flock there.
verses.ct: Bring your burnt offerings, your sacrifices, your tithes, your special contributions, your vow offerings, your freewill offerings, and the firstborn of your herds and flocks there.

verses.kjv: And there ye shall eat before the LORD your God, and ye shall rejoice in all that ye put your hand unto, ye and your households, wherein the LORD thy God hath blessed thee.
verses.web: There you shall eat before LORD your God, and you shall rejoice in all that you put your hand to, you and your households, in which LORD your God has blessed you.
verses.ct: There, in the presence of the LORD your God, you and your families will eat and celebrate everything you've worked for, because the LORD your God has blessed you.

verses.kjv: Ye shall not do after all the things that we do here this day, every man whatsoever is right in his own eyes.
verses.web: You shall not do all the things that we do here today, every man whatever is right in his own eyes;
verses.ct: You must stop doing what we've been doing up to now — everyone just doing whatever seems right to them.

verses.kjv: For ye are not as yet come to the rest and to the inheritance, which the LORD your God giveth you.
verses.web: for you haven’t yet come to the rest and to the inheritance which LORD your God gives you.
verses.ct: You haven't yet reached the place of rest and the inheritance that the LORD your God is giving you.

verses.kjv: But when ye go over Jordan, and dwell in the land which the LORD your God giveth you to inherit, and when he giveth you rest from all your enemies round about, so that ye dwell in safety;
verses.web: But when you go over the Jordan and dwell in the land which LORD your God causes you to inherit, and he gives you rest from all your enemies around you, so that you dwell in safety,
verses.ct: But once you cross the Jordan and settle in the land the LORD your God is giving you as an inheritance, and once he gives you peace from all your surrounding enemies so that you live in safety —

verses.kjv: Then there shall be a place which the LORD your God shall choose to cause his name to dwell there; thither shall ye bring all that I command you; your burnt offerings, and your sacrifices, your tithes, and the heave offering of your hand, and all your choice vows which ye vow unto the LORD:
verses.web: then it shall happen that to the place which LORD your God shall choose, to cause his name to dwell there, there you shall bring all that I command you: your burnt offerings, your sacrifices, your tithes, the wave offering of your hand, and all your choice vows which you vow to LORD.
verses.ct: then you must bring everything I'm commanding you to the place the LORD your God chooses to establish his name: your burnt offerings, your sacrifices, your tithes, your special contributions, and all the best of what you've vowed to the LORD.

verses.kjv: And ye shall rejoice before the LORD your God, ye, and your sons, and your daughters, and your menservants, and your maidservants, and the Levite that is within your gates; forasmuch as he hath no part nor inheritance with you.
verses.web: You shall rejoice before LORD your God—you, and your sons, your daughters, your male servants, your female servants, and the Levite who is within your gates, because he has no portion nor inheritance with you.
verses.ct: Celebrate there in the presence of the LORD your God — you, your sons and daughters, your male and female servants, and the Levites living in your towns, since the Levites have no land or inheritance of their own among you.

verses.kjv: Take heed to thyself that thou offer not thy burnt offerings in every place that thou seest:
verses.web: Be careful that you don’t offer your burnt offerings in every place that you see;
verses.ct: Be careful not to offer your burnt offerings just anywhere you please.

verses.kjv: But in the place which the LORD shall choose in one of thy tribes, there thou shalt offer thy burnt offerings, and there thou shalt do all that I command thee.
verses.web: but in the place which LORD chooses in one of your tribes, there you shall offer your burnt offerings, and there you shall do all that I command you.
verses.ct: Only at the place the LORD chooses within one of your tribal territories — that is where you must offer your burnt offerings and carry out everything I command you.

verses.kjv: Notwithstanding thou mayest kill and eat flesh in all thy gates, whatsoever thy soul lusteth after, according to the blessing of the LORD thy God which he hath given thee: the unclean and the clean may eat thereof, as of the roebuck, and as of the hart.
verses.web: Yet you may kill and eat meat within all your gates, after all the desire of your soul, according to LORD your God’s blessing which he has given you. The unclean and the clean may eat of it, as of the gazelle and the deer.
verses.ct: However, you may slaughter and eat meat in any of your towns whenever you want, as much as the LORD your God's blessing provides. Anyone, whether ceremonially clean or unclean, may eat it — just as you would eat gazelle or deer.

verses.kjv: Only ye shall not eat the blood; ye shall pour it upon the earth as water.
verses.web: Only you shall not eat the blood. You shall pour it out on the earth like water.
verses.ct: But you must never eat the blood. Pour it out on the ground like water.

verses.kjv: Thou mayest not eat within thy gates the tithe of thy corn, or of thy wine, or of thy oil, or the firstlings of thy herds or of thy flock, nor any of thy vows which thou vowest, nor thy freewill offerings, or heave offering of thine hand:
verses.web: You may not eat within your gates the tithe of your grain, or of your new wine, or of your oil, or the firstborn of your herd or of your flock, nor any of your vows which you vow, nor your free will offerings, nor the wave offering of your hand;
verses.ct: You may not eat the following things in your own towns: the tithe of your grain, new wine, or olive oil; the firstborn of your herds or flocks; anything you've vowed to give; your freewill offerings; or your special contributions.

verses.kjv: But thou must eat them before the LORD thy God in the place which the LORD thy God shall choose, thou, and thy son, and thy daughter, and thy manservant, and thy maidservant, and the Levite that is within thy gates: and thou shalt rejoice before the LORD thy God in all that thou puttest thine hands unto.
verses.web: but you shall eat them before LORD your God in the place which LORD your God shall choose: you, your son, your daughter, your male servant, your female servant, and the Levite who is within your gates. You shall rejoice before LORD your God in all that you put your hand to.
verses.ct: Instead, you must eat these in the presence of the LORD your God at the place the LORD your God chooses — you, your sons and daughters, your male and female servants, and the Levites living in your towns. Celebrate in the LORD your God's presence over everything you've worked for.

verses.kjv: Take heed to thyself that thou forsake not the Levite as long as thou livest upon the earth.
verses.web: Be careful that you don’t forsake the Levite as long as you live in your land.
verses.ct: Be careful never to neglect the Levites for as long as you live in your land.

verses.kjv: When the LORD thy God shall enlarge thy border, as he hath promised thee, and thou shalt say, I will eat flesh, because thy soul longeth to eat flesh; thou mayest eat flesh, whatsoever thy soul lusteth after.
verses.web: When LORD your God enlarges your border, as he has promised you, and you say, “I want to eat meat,” because your soul desires to eat meat, you may eat meat, after all the desire of your soul.
verses.ct: When the LORD your God expands your territory as he promised, and you say, "I'd like some meat," because you're craving it — go ahead and eat as much meat as you want.

verses.kjv: If the place which the LORD thy God hath chosen to put his name there be too far from thee, then thou shalt kill of thy herd and of thy flock, which the LORD hath given thee, as I have commanded thee, and thou shalt eat in thy gates whatsoever thy soul lusteth after.
verses.web: If the place which LORD your God shall choose to put his name is too far from you, then you shall kill of your herd and of your flock, which LORD has given you, as I have commanded you; and you may eat within your gates, after all the desire of your soul.
verses.ct: If the place the LORD your God chooses to establish his name is too far away, then you may slaughter animals from the herds and flocks the LORD has given you, just as I've instructed, and eat the meat in your own towns whenever you want.

verses.kjv: Even as the roebuck and the hart is eaten, so thou shalt eat them: the unclean and the clean shall eat of them alike.
verses.web: Even as the gazelle and as the deer is eaten, so you shall eat of it. The unclean and the clean may eat of it alike.
verses.ct: Eat it the same way you'd eat gazelle or deer — anyone may eat it, whether ceremonially clean or unclean.

verses.kjv: Only be sure that thou eat not the blood: for the blood is the life; and thou mayest not eat the life with the flesh.
verses.web: Only be sure that you don’t eat the blood; for the blood is the life. You shall not eat the life with the meat.
verses.ct: Just be absolutely sure you don't eat the blood, because the blood is the life, and you must not eat the life along with the meat.

verses.kjv: Thou shalt not eat it; thou shalt pour it upon the earth as water.
verses.web: You shall not eat it. You shall pour it out on the earth like water.
verses.ct: Don't eat it. Pour it out on the ground like water.

verses.kjv: Thou shalt not eat it; that it may go well with thee, and with thy children after thee, when thou shalt do that which is right in the sight of the LORD.
verses.web: You shall not eat it, that it may go well with you and with your children after you, when you do that which is right in LORD’s eyes.
verses.ct: Don't eat it, so that things will go well for you and your children after you, because you will be doing what the LORD considers right.

verses.kjv: Only thy holy things which thou hast, and thy vows, thou shalt take, and go unto the place which the LORD shall choose:
verses.web: Only your holy things which you have, and your vows, you shall take and go to the place which LORD shall choose.
verses.ct: But take your sacred offerings and your vow offerings and go to the place the LORD chooses.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt offer thy burnt offerings, the flesh and the blood, upon the altar of the LORD thy God: and the blood of thy sacrifices shall be poured out upon the altar of the LORD thy God, and thou shalt eat the flesh.
verses.web: You shall offer your burnt offerings, the meat and the blood, on LORD your God’s altar. The blood of your sacrifices shall be poured out on LORD your God’s altar, and you shall eat the meat.
verses.ct: Present your burnt offerings — both the meat and the blood — on the altar of the LORD your God. The blood of your sacrifices must be poured out on the altar of the LORD your God, and then you may eat the meat.

verses.kjv: Observe and hear all these words which I command thee, that it may go well with thee, and with thy children after thee for ever, when thou doest that which is good and right in the sight of the LORD thy God.
verses.web: Observe and hear all these words which I command you, that it may go well with you and with your children after you forever, when you do that which is good and right in LORD your God’s eyes.
verses.ct: Pay attention to everything I'm commanding you and obey it carefully, so that things will go well for you and your descendants forever, because you will be doing what the LORD your God considers good and right.

verses.kjv: When the LORD thy God shall cut off the nations from before thee, whither thou goest to possess them, and thou succeedest them, and dwellest in their land;
verses.web: When LORD your God cuts off the nations from before you where you go in to dispossess them, and you dispossess them and dwell in their land,
verses.ct: When the LORD your God destroys the nations ahead of you as you move in to take their land, and after you've driven them out and settled in their territory —

verses.kjv: Take heed to thyself that thou be not snared by following them, after that they be destroyed from before thee; and that thou enquire not after their gods, saying, How did these nations serve their gods? even so will I do likewise.
verses.web: be careful that you are not ensnared to follow them after they are destroyed from before you, and that you not inquire after their gods, saying, “How do these nations serve their gods? I will do likewise.”
verses.ct: be careful not to fall into their trap by imitating them after they've been wiped out. Don't go looking into their gods, asking, "How did these nations worship their gods? I want to do the same thing."

verses.kjv: Thou shalt not do so unto the LORD thy God: for every abomination to the LORD, which he hateth, have they done unto their gods; for even their sons and their daughters they have burnt in the fire to their gods.
verses.web: You shall not do so to LORD your God; for every abomination to LORD, which he hates, they have done to their gods; for they even burn their sons and their daughters in the fire to their gods.
verses.ct: You must never worship the LORD your God that way, because these nations did every disgusting thing the LORD hates when they worshiped their gods — they even burned their own sons and daughters as sacrifices to them.

verses.kjv: What thing soever I command you, observe to do it: thou shalt not add thereto, nor diminish from it.
verses.web: Whatever thing I command you, that you shall observe to do. You shall not add to it, nor take away from it.
verses.ct: Everything I command you, be careful to do it. Don't add anything to it, and don't take anything away from it.
